data.message: What can we do we see something that should not be on Facebook? People has kids and they our on facebook , specially playing games and they do read what there friend send to them. I like have job in Facebook. I have good ideas

replies.message: Hi Phyllis. The best way to report abusive content on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content you would like to report. For some examples and to learn more, visit our Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1Lx26jK -Austin

Facebook your Help Center is a joke. Take a look at  https://www.facebook.com/groups/666466766831783/?ref=bookmarks and tell me that does not violate your guidelines. This page is humiliating people, degrading people and every admin is a fake profile set up to create hate on this page, every report goes unanswered and people are told it does not violate your community standards.

Another thing that would be great is to have one of you Facebook staff members occasionally monitor the behavior of those who call others names (i.e., not letting anyone get away with the " you're an idiot" line or anything like that). Should you see any verbal abuse from anyone, tell the abuser/s to stop.  Thank you.
